unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit the Indian Roads!**
normalised: auto buzz: new wheels hit the indian roads!

unnormalised: Namaste, petrolheads! The Indian auto market is buzzing with fresh launches. Dr. Agarwal from ARAI just gave the green light to a bunch of new vehicles, and we're here to give you the lowdown.
normalised: namaste, petrolheads! the indian auto market is buzzing with fresh launches. doctor agarwal from A R A I just gave the green light to a bunch of new vehicles, and we're here to give you the lowdown.

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra's teasing us with the Thar's baby brother – supposedly nimbler and perfect for navigating those chaotic Chandni Chowk lanes. Expect a Diwali release!
normalised: first up, mahindra's teasing us with the thar's baby brother – supposedly nimbler and perfect for navigating those chaotic chandni chowk lanes. expect a diwali release!

unnormalised: Then there's Tata Motors, who just unveiled their concept EV, the 'Vidyut Vahan', promising a range of 500 km on a single charge. Interiors boast a massive 150 sq ft display! Imagine playing Ludo on that!
normalised: then there's tata motors, who just unveiled their concept E V, the 'vidyut vahan', promising a range of five hundred kilometer on a single charge. interiors boast a massive one hundred and fifty square feet display! imagine playing ludo on that!

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki is rumoured to be refreshing the Baleno, adding more tech and safety features. They're also talking about a CNG version, aiming to pinch your pocket less with those rising petrol prices. Expect a price tag starting around Rs. 6 Lakh.
normalised: not to be left behind, maruti suzuki is rumoured to be refreshing the baleno, adding more tech and safety features. they're also talking about a C N G version, aiming to pinch your pocket less with those rising petrol prices. expect a price tag starting around rupee six lakh.

unnormalised: Lastly, Royal Enfield is all set to launch its much-awaited Himalayan 450, challenging KTM's adventure bike dominance. Gear up for some serious Ladakh trips, folks! Happy driving!
normalised: lastly, royal enfield is all set to launch its much awaited himalayan four hundred and fifty, challenging K T M's adventure bike dominance. gear up for some serious ladakh trips, folks! happy driving!
